title: Workshop on Designing One-Page Tools to Support Systems Thinking for Public Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of public administration fundamentals, systems thinking concepts, and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Problem-solving-centered learning environment based on real public organization cases, enabling prototype development using digital tablets and collaboration tools

learning_goals: Can analyze systemic issues in public organizations through one-page visual materials
Can design thinking tools applicable to management practices such as collaboration and organizational culture development
Can iteratively improve tool prototypes at least three times using Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
